title: I dreamed that I was crying a lot

preview.html: Where they interpreted the dream in the dream with specific elements for married women, single women, divorced women and men, so you have the following details about the dream from our translated site.Interpretation of a dream about a girl crying very loudlyThe interpretation of this vision has clear and understandable evidence, that there is a difference in all its aspects, according to what The dreamer is experiencing it at the present time. An unmarried woman dreams of this dream while she is crying, this indicates that the distress will soon be alleviated for her, if it is tears and not mourning. Interpretation of a dream about crying loudly for an unmarried girl, is evidence that it means the end of the sorrows that she is experiencing in The current time and an increase in nutrition. Whether the interpretation of a single woman’s dream is that she is crying very loudly and is sick, this indicates that she is tormented by pain. The interpretation of a dream of crying in a dream for a single girl is evidence that she desires something in reality and wishes God to achieve it. If the girl sees She is crying while making a sound, this indicates that there is bad news, and she will hear it soon. The dream is related to psychological signs, so if she cries without a sound and smiles, this indicates that there is happiness, and great joy will come to her. The girl who sees that she dreams of someone crying in front of her and he is dear On her in reality. This indicates his need for her and him moving away from him. A girl who dreams of crying loudly and intensely is evidence that she is going through a psychological and emotional crisis that she wants to get rid of. Scientists have shown that the interpretation of a dream about a girl who cries a lot for someone. This indicates her need for him, especially If the crying is for one of her parents. See also: Interpretation of seeing crying in a dream in detail. Interpretation of the statement that I cry a lot in a dream with a married woman. Interpretation of a dream of a married woman crying a lot in a dream. This indicates the presence of marital problems and disputes that she is currently facing. A married woman who sees her husband crying, the vision indicates It is good news that she is about to become pregnant, and indicates the happiness of her husband. A married woman who sees in her dream that she is crying without moaning or loud noises, the dream is evidence of the stability of her married life. A married woman who dreams that she is crying for her husband and screaming at him indicates that the husband is suffering. From material losses. A married woman who sees herself crying while holding the Book of God and reading from it shows that all her worries have disappeared. A married woman crying when she is slapped in the face, this is a sign of family disputes, and it could be a sign of complete separation. Interpretation of a dream about a man crying loudly Very and what does that mean? The man who sees in his dream crying a lot and the dreamer wants to travel indicates that he is moving from his country and his wishes are fulfilled. Either the man who cries loudly and annoyingly, indicates the loss of his current job and is suffering a lot at the present time. The man who sees in his dream that He cries with tears, then this dream is evidence of a change in his situation. If a man cries while he is married in reality, this is evidence that he will receive favor and goodness from God along with a lot of provision. A man who dreams that he cries loudly and burningly, and he is a business owner, is evidence of his suffering. And his loss in business. The meaning of seeing that I cry a lot

title: Interpretation of a dream about collecting gold pounds in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about collecting gold pounds in a dream. Some people want to know the interpretation of a dream about collecting gold pounds in a dream. This is one of the dreams that many people wanted to know the interpretation of this vision. Interpretations, but from diligent scholars who interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream about collecting gold pounds in a dream Collecting gold pounds in a dream may indicate the marriage of an unmarried young man or an unmarried girl. The dream of collecting gold pounds may indicate the enormous level of livelihood that the dreamer will gain during this time. If a person sees that he was collecting gold pounds in a dream, this may indicate peace of mind and relief from the stress and tension that the dreamer is suffering from in those days. If you see yourself harvesting gold pounds in a dream, this may indicate the achievement of goals and ambitions during these days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting dirhams from the ground in a dream Anyone who sees in a dream that he is collecting dirhams from the ground can indicate many good things that will come to the dreamer during this time. The dream of collecting dirhams from the ground in a dream may indicate positive changes that will happen to its owner in those days. Whoever sees in a dream that he is collecting dirhams may indicate the happy events that will come to the dreamer during that period. Seeing the collection of dirhams in a dream may indicate upcoming joys for the dreamer in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting hail in a dream Picking up hail in a dream may mean that the dreamer will face Some obstacles in his life these days. Picking up hail in a dream may indicate psychological disturbances that the dreamer may suffer from at that time. Whoever sees that he is collecting hail may indicate the achievement of goals and ambitions in those days, and God knows best. If you see yourself picking up a hailstone in a dream, this may mean that the dreamer will face some worries in his life during those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting beads in a dream Collecting rosaries in a dream can indicate the wealth and luxury that the dreamer was living in at that time. If a person sees that he was collecting beads in a dream, this may indicate his marriage to a righteous woman in those days. In the event that he sees collecting rosary beads in a dream, this may indicate the peace and stability that the dreamer was enjoying in his life at that time. It is possible that seeing the collection of rosaries in a dream may indicate the happy events coming to the dreamer in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting rice grains in a dream Seeing someone picking rice grains in a dream may indicate the large amount of money that the dreamer obtains in the life of that period. Collecting rice in a dream may be a sign of the good things that the dreamer will come with in those days. In the event that there is a personal opinion that she collected rice grains, This may indicate that she will enter into a new project or that she will get good profits in those days. It is possible that seeing the collection of rice grains in a dream means getting rid of the difficulties that the dreamer was facing in his life at that time, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of fruits in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: We tell you in detail about the interpretation of fruit in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Dreams are an essential part of our day. Who among us does not wake up one day to search for an explanation for the events and situations he saw in his dreams, because he desperately wants to know what are the happy things that warn him of good or bad things, and warn of the appearance of evil, God forbid. Although some believe that dreams are not More than a set of unrelated states that arise from the human subconscious and have no relation to real human life, the truth is that dreams are a mirror of the reality a person carries within him. Of the many symbols and signs that announce the events that a person will experience in his life. So among the dreams that portend good or portend evil, there is nothing in our hands but accepting God’s destiny, destiny, goodness and evil, for He alone knows everything and is capable of everything, and today we present it . Here is the interpretation of fruit in a dream by Ibn Sirin from the Encyclopedia website. Interpretation of fruit in a dream. Interpretation of seeing fruits in a dream by Ibn Sirin. However, the Islamic commentator Ibn Sirin mentioned in his book The Interpretation of Great Dreams that seeing fruits in a dream is one of the things worthy of praise because it indicates the spread of goodness, nourishment, and blessing in one’s life. Who dreams of it? Whoever sees wet fruit in a dream, this is evidence that the dreamer has money and a lot of sustenance, but this money will disappear quickly, because wet fruit does not last long and expires quickly and spoils. As for seeing fruit with its green leaves, light appearance, and appetizing body in a dream, it indicates a future. It is bright for the dreamer and that he will be able in the future to achieve all his hopes and aspirations. Whoever dreams of dried fruit or buys fruit will have many goodness and blessings in his life, and seeing and eating the fruit in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will acquire great wealth. The worries of the world are enough for him throughout his life. How often does he see in his dream that there is fruit scattered on it, which indicates that he is a man of good character and a good reputation among the people. While the dreamer sees that he is eating types of fruits at the wrong time, this is a warning that this person will soon lose money. While the dreamer sees that he sees that he is eating fruits with his hand, this indicates that this person will study jurisprudence and religious sciences, but will not benefit from this study. Interpretation of seeing fruits in a dream for a single woman: Seeing fruits in an unmarried girl’s dream is one of the praiseworthy things in the dream, which indicates that she She will get married soon and God Almighty will grant her a lot of sustenance and money in the near future, God willing. If an unmarried woman sees a large fruit in her dream, it is a sign of relief from worries, getting rid of anxiety, and comfort in the affairs of her life, such as work or marriage. But seeing an unmarried woman drinking juice Fruit indicates that she will suffer from some problems in her life, or perhaps her husbands will be late, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing fruit in a dream for a pregnant woman: When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is eating one of the fruits, this is a sign that she

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an earthquake in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of earthquakes An earthquake is a tremor that strikes the ground and can demolish homes. Seeing him in a dream means disaster, death, failure and poverty. Follow us on the Roya website. Interpretation of the detailed projection of the earthquake in a dream, according to the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, or contemporary commentators. Interpretation of seeing an earthquake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing an earthquake in a dream means drought and an increase in the cost of living. Seeing an earthquake in the house and the appearance of walls indicates The dream indicates the death of someone from that house, it may be the father or mother. Seeing an earthquake on a mountain in a dream indicates the misfortune of the ruler. Seeing the unknown sheikh indicates repentance for sins. Interpretation of a dream about an earthquake occurring for a single woman in a dream. The occurrence of an earthquake in a single person’s dream indicates... The presence of a problem and instability. When seeing a girl who managed to survive an earthquake, this shows some of the difficulties she is facing. If a girl sees an earthquake in a dream and hides some dangers and collapses behind it, this is a sign that she will make a decision that will cause her some future consequences and problems. Interpretation of a dream about an earthquake For a married woman in a dream: Seeing a married woman who was not affected by the earthquake indicates that you will get rid of the problems you are going through. If you see an earthquake causing the earth to split and water to emerge from it, this is a sign of goodness and blessing. Seeing the earth coming out of gold or water after the earthquake, this indicates The ambitions that he seeks to achieve. Interpretation of an earthquake for a divorced woman in a dream: If a divorced or widowed woman sees an earthquake in her home, this indicates the instability of her life and the many worries she carries. Seeing a divorced or widowed woman running and hiding from the earthquake in a dream means that she has been saved from distress, pain, and illness. And improved living conditions. Interpretation of a dream about an earthquake occurring for a pregnant woman in a dream. An earthquake in a dream indicates the nearest date of birth. Seeing an earthquake in a pregnant woman’s dream did not follow any disaster, because this vision is praiseworthy. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream about an earthquake occurring was in the last month of pregnancy. This indicates the safety of the newborn. Interpretation of a dream about an earthquake occurring for a man in a dream. If a man sees an earthquake and tremors in a dream, and that was in November, this indicates the false feelings he feels towards his fiancée or his wife. Seeing an earthquake for a married man in a dream means making decisions Hasty. A man’s survival in a dream about an earthquake means eliminating problems. Seeing an earthquake in a man’s dream is a sign of trouble and fear. Interpretation of dreams to escape from an earthquake. Seeing an escape from an earthquake is evidence of survival. Escaping from an earthquake indicates the patient’s recovery from illness and the debtor’s debts. It may Escaping from an earthquake indicates that you have survived a terrible accident. Dream Interpretation of Earthquakes and House Demolitions Seeing an earthquake in the house means the death of a family member or a disaster. Seeing an earthquake with the walls of the house collapsing can indicate marital problems and quarrels that lead to divorce.

When she sees A divorced woman, hitting the enemy in the eyes may mean that you are thinking about religious matters and that God has all knowledge. title: Interpretation of hair lice in a dream: removing lice from the hair in a dream

preview.html: Seeing lice for a single, married, pregnant, divorced girl, killing lice, lice falling from the hair, removing lice from the head, a dream about lice in my daughter’s hair, according to Ibn Sirin and according to Imam Al-Sadiq and others. Interpretation of a dream about lice, as the interpretation of lice differed according to opinion, so the interpretation differs Dreaming of lice about engaged, married, single, or divorced people, each case has its own interpretation. Interpretation of lice in a dream: Removing lice from the hair or clothes by hand or with a comb is good and useful evidence. A lot of lice in a dream, worries and problems. Killing lice in a dream is a blessing and relieves worries. Lice on a new shirt indicates A dream indicates a promotion at work. A lice bite is that someone is cursing you and speaking badly about you. Killing a louse with a number in a dream may be your injustice to your children or servants, or you may get rid of a weak enemy. Interpretation of hair lice in a dream. Interpretation of seeing lice in a dream is in the hair, as this indicates the presence of Lice and the abundance of goodness and God’s mastery in procreation. Removing a lice from the head in a dream indicates getting rid of a disease that afflicts that person. His children. One of the scholars explained that seeing lice in a dream indicates the presence of hypocrites and bad people who are harming the dreamer. If this fortune-teller kills those lice, this indicates that he has gotten rid of them. Some scholars have interpreted the removal of lice from the head as a cure for a person from a disease that befell him, and if the fortune-teller is in debt, this indicates that God Almighty has paid his debt. And if the dreamer is poor, this indicates... God Almighty will give him a lot of money, and removing a lice from his hair in a dream may indicate getting rid of the presence of bad friends. One scholar said: Seeing lice on a sick person’s head is an increase in his illness, just as seeing lice on a rich person is an increase in his money. He also said that lice indicates an increase in money and an increase in children. If a married woman sees lice on her head, this indicates the growth of her children. Interpretation of lice in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing lice for a pregnant woman, whether she sees it on her head or on her body, indicates money and children, in the event that She only saw it, but if she was bitten by a lice, the interpretation varies. This is explained by the fact that there are enemies who are harming this pregnant woman, whether through injustice or gossip. If the pregnant woman kills this louse that she saw in a dream and bit it, this means that she has gotten rid of it. These people who take it with them. Their language, and there is another interpretation that if a pregnant woman sees lice, this indicates that she will give birth safely. Interpretation of lice in a dream for a single woman. Seeing lice for a single girl shows that there is a lot of goodness and may indicate the fulfillment of that girl’s dreams and desires and may indicate To engagement and marriage. Interpretation of lice in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about lice for a married woman as money, children, and all her possessions, but if lice bite her in a dream, this indicates that someone is speaking badly about her. If a pregnant woman sees a large number of lice, This indicates an increase in her fears and sorrows, and it can be interpreted that she will fall ill, and it can be interpreted that she will face a big problem. Interpretation of

title: The most important 20 interpretations of a dream about seeing a teacher he loved, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a teacher that I love: It is considered one of the happy things for its owner, especially if the relationship is full of friendship between him and this teacher. Education is one of the basic things in our lives. During study, we meet many positive and negative role models of teachers, some of which have a positive impact and others have a negative impact, and the case of seeing one These people in reality lead to many things that vary depending on the social status of the viewer and the events of the dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a teacher that she loves. Seeing a divorced woman who was her favorite teacher in her dream symbolizes that many burdens will fall on her and she must be patient until she passes this stage. A woman in her months of pregnancy, When you see in a dream the teacher you love, it is a sign that symbolizes salvation from any problems and fears that you suffer from. A wife who sees in her dream her beloved teacher from a dream symbolizes walking on the path of righteousness, and a sign that the dreamer will succeed whether in managing her home or in raising her children. Seeing a beloved teacher in a dream means that you are living a life full of stability and tranquility. Seeing an old teacher in a dream means that some good things will happen to the dreamer, such as a new job, successful social relationships, success, and other things. Interpretation of dreams to see a teacher that you love by Ibn Sirin: To dream of a teacher that you love In a dream, it symbolizes that you will hear some good news in the near future, God willing. Seeing the teacher you love in a dream means getting rid of any worries and sorrows in the dreamer’s life. A person who sees in his dream that he loves his teacher is an indication of the pursuit of worldly pleasures and a sign that indicates... That he follows desires and disobeys sins, and God knows best. Attending a school to teach the Arabic language in a dream for married couples leads to getting rid of any marital problems and living in stability and peace of mind with the partner. Interpretation of a dream about kissing a teacher’s hand in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing him kissing the teacher’s hand in a man’s dream indicates His good morals and that he does not forget the value of everyone who helped him reach the brilliant position in which he finds himself now. Seeing the teacher’s hand kissed with respect in a dream symbolizes the pioneer’s good morals and enjoying his good morals and reputation. To dream that kissing the teacher’s hand in a dream means salvation from any Crises and problems in life. To dream that I arrogantly kiss a teacher’s hand means that you are following desires and walking on the path of deception. Interpretation of dreams for single women in which I see a teacher I love. To dream of a beloved teacher means that the dreamer is on the path of righteousness and that she is doing many good deeds in her life. Vision. An Arabic language teacher in an older girl’s dream means that she is a superior person who will obtain high grades compared to her peers and will reach a prominent position in her society, God willing. Seeing a teacher kissing an unmarried woman in a dream symbolizes the arrival of many good things in the future and indicates abundant sustenance. Dreaming of a teacher whom he loves in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s need to devote himself to acts of worship and worship more.Interpretation

title: Interpretation of seeing someone giving me dollars in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about someone giving me dollars in a dream through the website Roy2a.com. Seeing dollars in a dream means good luck, wealth, fortune, and strength of character, in addition to achieving goals as well as participating in a prestigious job. Interpretation of visions and dreams, ancient or contemporary, in a dream about a single young man or girl, about a married man or woman, or a widow and a pregnant woman. Follow us on the Vision website. Interpretation of a dream about someone giving me dollars in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing someone giving me dollars in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing dollars in a dream for an unmarried young man means excellence and success in professional life, earning a lot of money and successful business and investment projects. Seeing dollars in a dream for a married person indicates the birth of male offspring. Seeing fake dollars in a dream is not good and indicates bad friends, hypocrites or a bad personality. For the pioneer. Seeing a wheel in a dream means good luck and good news. Other related dreams: Interpretation of seeing in a dream someone gave me banknotes. What is the interpretation of seeing someone giving me dollars in a dream for a single woman? If a single woman sees that she found new dollars in a dream, this It means that she will get a prestigious job or a rich trip to a European country. A fake dollar is not good and a torn dollar is bad luck. What is the interpretation of seeing someone giving me dollars in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a new dollar in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will soon become pregnant with a child If a married woman sees that her husband gives her dollars, this indicates the strong relationship with her husband and the friendly relationship between them and wealth and wealth in their lives. If a married woman sees golden dollars in a dream, this indicates an improvement in her financial situation, achieving what she wants, and prosperity in life. It also indicates the renewal of her life. Other related dreams: Interpretation of a dream about papers, metal, silver, or counterfeit money. What is the interpretation of seeing someone give me dollars in a dream about a pregnant woman? Seeing dollars in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the cessation of fatigue and pain and the ease of childbirth. If she sees If a pregnant woman sees one, two or three dollars, this indicates living with a child, and an even number indicates the birth of a boy. What is the interpretation of seeing someone giving me dollars in a dream for a divorced woman? Seeing divorced dollars in a dream indicates good luck and the opportunity to find A new job with a satisfactory salary. If a divorced woman sees that someone is giving her dollars, this indicates that she will marry a rich man again, as well as achieving what she wanted. Other related dreams: Interpretation of seeing a gift of money in a dream What is the interpretation of a dream that someone gives me dollars For single people? If a girl sees that she has a lot of dollars in a dream, this indicates success and distinction in her professional life, reaching the highest positions, and we wish you success. Seeing a married woman having dollars in a dream indicates achieving marital happiness and the strength of her personality. What is the interpretation of a dream? Stealing D

title: Interpretation of a dream about paralysis by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about paralysis in a dream: Seeing paralysis in a dream is an indication that the dreamer is wearing disobedience and is doing many things that God has forbidden. Paralysis of the hand in a dream is evidence of his injustice to others and failure to restore rights to their owners. As for the paralysis of the legs, it indicates stagnation in trade, loss of work, and subsequent economic crises. After that, the interpretation of paralysis in a dream varies according to the paralyzed organ, as it is one of the unpleasant dreams in the generality of its interpretation. Interpretation of seeing a paralyzed person in a dream for a single woman: Seeing paralysis in one dream, she was paralyzed, which indicates that she has suffered from many crises and problems in the current period of her life. The real one. What follows is a bad and psychological disorder, and she must wait and be calm in the face of these crises until this period passes. Seeing one of her relatives in a dream suffering from paralysis is a sign of the urgent need for financial assistance that this person needs, so she must provide him with help. Sister The unmarried woman is paralyzed. This dream interprets the strong bond between them and their desire to maintain the spirit of affection and love between them. It is also interpreted as the fortuneteller’s refusal to delve into people’s symptoms, such as puns, gossip and other prohibitions. Interpretation of a dream of facial paralysis for a single woman. Facial paralysis in a dream for a single woman. It indicates her desire Rooted in interdependence and the formation of a family. It also explains the need for the emotion of love to feel the value of life due to the presence of these feelings. Then it indicates the delay of marriage because there is no suitable person for marriage, and it also indicates that there are many people around her who want to show her in a bad image. Interpretation of seeing facial paralysis for a woman The married woman referred to Ibn Sirin’s sayings in interpreting a dream about facial paralysis for married people. It indicates the problems she is going through in marital life, the psychological pressure that arises in the current period, and the constant fear for the future of her children. Hence, seeing a woman in a dream whose husband suffers from facial paralysis indicates To what the husband is going through in severe financial crises that have led to his bad psychological state in the current period of his real life. The paralysis of the mother’s face in a married woman’s dream means hearing good news soon, God willing. The interpretation of the dream of oral paralysis explains to single people that it is news of the end of worries, relief from anxiety, and the stability of family affairs. It has also been interpreted in some sayings as an indication of shortness of life and feelings of depression and sadness. Oral paralysis in a married woman’s dream indicates her constant thinking about her family life and her desire to stabilize her future life for herself and her family. Then the man sees in his dream that he has oral paralysis. This is interpreted because he made some decisive decisions. In some aspects of his life, he needs to be careful and aware of the consequences of those decisions. Interpretation of a vision of leg paralysis for a single woman. Tell me what she is going through. It is not related to the financial hardship to the current period of her real life. It also indicates things that negatively affect her life and make her feel very sad and fall into anxiety. And anxiety. An unmarried woman who broke off her engagement dreamed that her fiancé was paralyzed. He suggests the possibility of returning to...

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about coins in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about coins in a dream: There is no doubt that in reality everyone is happy to see money in all its forms, whether paper or metal, and this also happens in a dream, but to understand everything it means to see in a dream, whether for a man or a woman, it is necessary to know the interpretation of the currency symbol in A dream, where this symbol includes more than one condition. Interpretation of a dream about coins in a dream: Seeing coins in a dream means that the dreamer is going through a state of problems that are exhausting him and making him unable to cope better with his life. If the dreamer finds them while walking on a certain path, this means That he will achieve every dream he desires in his life. Perhaps it indicates some unpleasant news and events for the dreamer that make him feel upset during this period of his life. If the dreamer sees that money has fallen on the ground and begins to collect it, but finds it missing and incomplete in number, then this It indicates a failure in trade that will cause him to suffer a huge loss in his money. Perhaps seeing her in a dream in this way is an expression of endless kindness in the coming period. If the dreamer sees that her appearance appears ugly in the dream and her appearance is inappropriate, then this expresses the presence of some bad events in the dream. His life. If he can determine their number and it is five, this indicates that the dreamer does not miss his five prayers no matter what happens, and that he is clearly a religious person and always seeks to get closer to his Lord. If it is formed in green, this indicates goodness and blessing for that dreamer and that he will enter In many profitable and successful projects. This color also suggests that he will recover from any fatigue or sadness that befell him in his early days. The vision may express that the dreamer will find his life partner carefully because he has been dreaming all his life. If he sees that he is getting it from someone he has never met... Before, this indicates that he will benefit greatly from it in reality and his money will increase. If the dreamer throws this money from his house in his dream, this indicates his ability to solve his problems once and for all and without loss. The vision indicates that there are difficulties on the dreamer’s path, and the amount of these difficulties is limited. On the amount of money in the dream. Interpretation of dreams about money by Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer picks it up from the ground to take it with him, this indicates that he will be very happy to eat a lot of food in the coming season. And if he sees that he is collecting this money and it is large in size, this indicates that his life in the coming days It will change for the better and he will get great happiness that he does not expect. When the dreamer sees that there are many of them and does not feel happy in his sleep when he receives them, this indicates that he may be affected by many things in his life that will affect him greatly. Also, seeing a large amount shows some news that It will bother him in the coming days. Borrowing it in a dream does not indicate evil, but rather expresses people’s love for him and that he is a person who loves those around him very much. If he sees that he obtains it without doing any work or effort to obtain it, this indicates a great livelihood for him without any Fatigue or effort on his part to reach it. Interpretation of dreams about money by Ibn Sirin

Also, seeing a large amount shows some news that It will bother him in the coming days. Borrowing it in a dream does not indicate evil, but rather expresses people’s love for him and that he is a person who loves those around him very much. If he sees that he obtains it without doing any work or effort to obtain it, this indicates a great livelihood for him without any Fatigue or effort on his part to reach it. Interpretation of dreams about money by Ibn Sirin
